autumn.util

Class Threads

  • java.lang.Object
    • autumn.util.Threads

  • public final class Threads
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides static utility methods for working with threads.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Threads() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.Thread newThread(TypedFunctor functor)
      This method creates a new Thread object that can run a functor.
      static void sync(java.lang.Object locked, TypedFunctor body)
      This method synchronizes the invocation of a functor.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Threads

        public Threads()

    • Method Detail

      • newThread

        public static java.lang.Thread newThread(TypedFunctor functor)
        This method creates a new Thread object that can run a functor.

        This method does not start the thread.

        Parameters:
        functor - is the functor that is run by the new thread.
        Returns:
        the newly created thread.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the functor is non-nullary.

      • sync

        public static void sync(java.lang.Object locked,
        TypedFunctor body)
                 throws java.lang.Throwable
        This method synchronizes the invocation of a functor.
        Parameters:
        locked - is the object to obtain a lock on.
        body - is the functor to invoke.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Throwable - if an exception is thrown by the functor.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the functor is non-nullary.
